phrases: Alarm - tap to snooze > slide to stop alarm
You said you did not need lunch, so I decided to put more effort into breakfast!
Put more effort... looks like that is nothing more than adding pizza sauce...
It already has sugar in it, and has the extra sweetness from the pizza sauce!
Seems like I am not feeling too well.
Can it be that you caught a cold?
Maybe you should stay home from school?
I am sorry I am making you worry...
You should take the day off today!
No, no, there are no real issues with my condition.
How should I seal away that pizza sauce...
Hey, hey, I got amazing news!
Apparently Yusa Nishimori is transferring into our school!
This is not an art school or anything...
But, if she is the real thing, I would be so happy!
Everyone is so worked up about this already!
When she actually shows up, how much of a riot will there be?
I am troubled just thinking about it...
Now, she is a transfer student who will be your classmate starting today.
I am Yusa Kurobane, known as Yusarin!
Even in a place like this, she calls herself Yusarin?
So your real name is Kurobane?
Heh, you did not even know that?
I may not be able to attend school on some days due to work,
but I would like to really enjoy high school life with all of you!
It is a pleasure to meet all of you!
I am sure I will trouble you a lot, but it is nice to meet you!
It is such a great song!
Can we start by exchanging mail addresses-
You bastard, what are you saying so suddenly?
Do not leave us out of this!
Now, now, both of you, be nice to each other!
Is she really going to do that?
Making up with a magic spell!
The two of you have made up now!
No, I was in the wrong...
What is that so-called magic spell series?
Yusa had been a regular cast member of the morning information show Movement Asa!
After the day's fortunes, towards the viewers who had bad luck,
But, two of them actually overlap, so there really are only 63...
Oh, will the helper appear before us again?
What is up with that, student council president?
Kurobane, I would like you to come with us immediately to the student council room.
That is too cruel, student council president!
Yusa, that magic spell earlier - series 13, the spell for making up... it was marvelous!
You knew about it in that much detail?
I checked out the show the whole time while you were a part of it.
You are such a fanboy... such a turn-off, Takajo.
And, well... what are we going to do here?
However, we need you to prepare mentally so you are not
Rest assured, he is one of us.
Um, so in the end, what just went on here?
A guy with a special ability is there, and his power is telekinesis.
That guy found you in the same manner.
Yusarin here is going to do her best!
You may not realize it, but you can get possessed by spirits and have pyrokinesis.
You are a lot more amazing than this guy...
The location is a school, huh...
This is... let us se... Kannai Academy.
This is a sports newspaper from last week!
I had my eyes on this guy!
Three perfect games in a row!
no doubt this super-high-school level pitcher will join the pro league!
The next day, I went and watched them practice.
Oh, that is some curve ball!
He is like major league caliber.
we get a close-up of the pitcher's throwing hand.
His grip is that of a straight ball.
Knuckle balls are supposed to be
balls that move irregularly by holding the ball rotation as much as possible.
The basic knuckle ball is thrown by putting
your index and middle fingers against the ball like this.
How you hold a ball for a straight pitch makes the ball rotate,
and it will never make the ball shake as much as it just did.
In the end, he is using telekinesis to move the ball around right after throwing it?
Wow, that is amazing in its own way!
Does she get any of this?
It will be bad if we cannot get a hold of him
before the qualifiers for going to Koushien starts.
Let us head there right away.
as long as you are part of the student council...
We are from the Hoshinoumi Academy student council.
Please ignore her, and for now listen to what I have to say.
Do you use telekinesis to throw knuckle balls?
Of course I do not have such a thing.
Are you some occult research club instead of the student council?
That power is like a disease that is only around during puberty.
Even if you were aiming to be a pro, by then, your powers will be gone.
Not only that, but if someone notices that you have powers,
And, your body will become one that can never play baseball again.
So, from here on, please do not use that special ability of yours.
By scientists who are researching people with abilities, just like you.
And you want me to believe such an idiotic thing?
You really are a sore loser, are not you?
How about we make a whole roast out of him?
Do not show off in a place like this!
No... this would be Misa's saliva...
I am troubled at how I should react!
Getting back to the main discussion...
So, what will it be in the end?
But no, this is... this has to be...
No, wait... in the first place...
Then, how about we face each other in baseball?
Our baseball team versus your baseball team.
If we win, do as we say.
And if we win, do not have anything to do with me ever again.
But still, you will never become a professional baseball player.
I do not understand what drives you so far.
I want to go to Koushien Stadium.
Next Sunday at 3:00PM, at our school courtyard.
I do not have problems with that.
So someone that can hit that knuckle ball exists in our baseball team?
We will be using special abilities ourselves, so it will be all right.
What kind of abilities do these people have?
No, our baseball team, despite having several people
with potential, has no one that can use a special ability.
We are all a part of this?
If not, we will not be able to win.
Besides, if it is on our school courtyard, it would not turn into a riot.
Well, that was the appropriate move.
This gets me burning up for the first time in a while.
Let us have a good game!
Let us all do our best!
Our opposing team has girls in it, huh?
There is no way they would be able to hit your ball.
What meaning is there in a this game to begin with?
It is for the future, Takato...
If you say so, let us do it.
If you lose, I am smacking all your asses with a baseball bat!
that sounds like what the previous generation does.
They cannot even hit our pitcher's ball?
I am being serious here, though this
was such a sudden game to play.
What kind of talk is that?
You jackass, I will just abandon this game!
I would be troubled by that.
Then properly think before you talk!
Calming down with this magic spell!
That is a real knuckle ball...
there is no way we can hit something like that.
Smacking my ass with a bat, or whatever else, do what you would like.
But it is pretty amazing that pitches like that are consistently caught.
Even the catcher is super-high-school level, huh...
there is no way we can win this.
We just need one run... if the two of us can score one run,
we can win as long as the two of us protect that one run lead!
So they went after Yusa after all.
Misa, on the other hand, has athletic reflexes, I guess!
Dammit, Yusa's shoulders are so weak!
She can make the right decision, but she cannot physically keep up.
We should use abilities as well.
You need to take over the opponent's batter.
And the last two batters for them will listlessly swing their bats.
And you, just throw outside of the strike zone.
Just be careful to not throw a wild pitch.
Then, I am counting on you.
I have to use my powers for something like this?
It is two outs with the next guy...
If you want to be that thorough in winning this thing...
I did not think that far...
Just make sure to hit the ball when you bunt.
Then, use your ability to run past first base.
Will they be able to see me do so?
I will record the evidence with a super-high-speed camera.
If I screw up the next one, I will be out...
See, he is touched first base.
Come on now, it is safe!
It is safe, is not it?
We will not be wasting your sacrifice.
Someone, I need a pinch runner!
Yusa is weak, but I will use my own game sense to hit the ball!
And now it is your turn at bat, what will you do?
After my sacrifice bunt succeeds, one base hit and it is a walk-off.
I cannot hit that with my ability!
How about you go face things head-on every so often?
Yu Otosaka, the fiend of cheating on tests.
In a scene like this, I have to face this head-on?
I finally was able to hit...
His timing is starting to inch closer...
I guess I will move it a bit more for the next one.
Head to first base, the catcher fumbled!
Wait... why am I getting so happy about something like this?
Please never use that ability ever again.
I am just an ordinary pitcher... but Takato, the catcher, is different.
He is a catcher that really deserves to be in the spotlight.
The two of us have played together as a battery for a long time now.
He knew that the baseball team at our school was weak,
but still, he chose to pair up with me.
That is why I wanted to take him, even if it meant using this strange power...
to that big stage where even the pros would notice.
So instead of personal gain, you were using your ability for your friendship.
We won today's game by cheating.
But, you have been cheating while pitching this whole time.
But, people who properly watch are out there.
Even if you do not cheat.
In college, or in the business leagues,
you can keep watch over him as his best friend.
Someday, you will be able to brag that he is my best friend.
Can you try taking over his body?
As I said, it is a small experiment.
That is not something you say to your test subject.
He is the test subject, so do not worry.
No, it was not anything much... but did you figure something out?
I am not sure for now.
Just going to see how things go for a while.
I hope that for dinner, she did not use any of that pizza sauce!
A secret recipe of the Otosaka house - a cream stew full of broccoli!
Cream stew is supposed to be white...
That is why it is a secret recipe of the Otosaka house!
What do I believe in, you ask?
Of course, I have to believe in myself!
The power to believe, the power to challenge.
Oh, it is a new commercial from Yusarin!
And it is Haro-haro's new song!
Now accepting enrollment for summer classes at Shinkou Seminars!
Oh, that reminds me, did Yusarin really transfer to your school?
